trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There was one other sighting in Boise on or around November 5th 2012
Summary: There was an orb flashing every color imaginable
divs: Sighting Details4 weeks ago i saw the same thing above the boise airport and called someone listed for boise as being the head of the chapter and spoke with him about what i saw and as i am typing this i can see the same thing, i have no camera or smart phone but what i am seeing from my porch is an apparent orb in the distance over what appears to be the boise airport. This object is literally flashing all kinds of colors randomly and staying stationary. I lost sight of the object while actually typing this. My initial reaction to what i first saw 4 weeks ago was that it must be a satellite but the object stayed stationary for 20 minutes before it disappeared (no movement that i could see). Tonight when i saw the object it also didnt move but i only observed the object long enough for me to get to this site and start typing, maybe 7 minutes.
